elements.2211.03154_0b9931e18987289f34cf02b0d69b2: Recent advances in NLP are brought by a range of large-scale pretrained language models (PLMs)
elements.2211.03154_98044a6c280eea22754a4ef5b2c85: These PLMs have brought significant performance gains for a range of NLP tasks, circumventing the need to customize complex designs for specific tasks
elements.2211.03154_45207d0b1ae727775368feb4ef736: However, most current work focus on finetuning PLMs on a domain-specific datasets, ignoring the fact that the domain gap can lead to overfitting and even performance drop
elements.2211.03154_cbee5c45d59cb6987c54381621c59: Therefore, it is practically important to find an appropriate method to effectively adapt PLMs to a target domain of interest
elements.2211.03154_71e737f7660ceac75eed05f308f74: Recently, a range of methods have been proposed to achieve this purpose
elements.2211.03154_cbb2623b9560ccdf7d35a88e27614: Early surveys on domain adaptation are not suitable for PLMs due to the sophisticated behavior exhibited by PLMs from traditional models trained from scratch and that domain adaptation of PLMs need to be redesigned to take effect
elements.2211.03154_5a4be97d4e8a20c23be15e26d81c5: This paper aims to provide a survey on these newly proposed methods and shed light in how to apply traditional machine learning methods to newly evolved and future technologies
elements.2211.03154_d952d9d746b0a0c1c1973ea250330: By examining the issues of deploying PLMs for downstream tasks, we propose a taxonomy of domain adaptation approaches from a machine learning system view, covering methods for input augmentation, model optimization and personalization
elements.2211.03154_3671a863556a2ff531bcb8b49434a: We discuss and compare those methods and suggest promising future research directions.
elements.2211.03154_1c18d218a871f7d4d1f823b12a87b: pretrained language models, domain adaptation, transfer learning, data efficiency.
elements.2211.03154_ff15a68afade6a533f0f1ffa120e0: Language Processing (NLP) is undergoing a paradigm shift with the open-source of large-scale pretrained language models (PLMs), such as GPT
elements.2211.03154_3b731fc37a26a251773e9671700f9: Finetuing PLMs have demonstrated to be a strong baseline on a range of downstream tasks, mostly outperforming previous state-of-the-art task-specific models, making it the de-facto standard in NLP
elements.2211.03154_43c36fbbf39c49e74f2c458ee83a3: as their basic neural architecture, these PLMs are trained on broad data using different self-supervised learning tasks at scale
elements.2211.03154_954b38d38c81e6bc98616fc740f54: They play a central role as the
elements.2211.03154_b83383bbac9fb8d5db03e6b4c514f: for their knowledgeable yet incomplete character
elements.2211.03154_0e5da71df77498f0ed4febc50eaf9: The downside of PLMs lies in the lack of portability to real-world domains
elements.2211.03154_04d0f04029b4edbb7e280eafd27cb: PLMs are pretrained by the universal language data, leaving the domain challenges unresolved
elements.2211.03154_4364234490aa82fbe74a1a7ee93d6: A bunch of evidence have surfaced showing that their performance can degrade when they are applied to a narrower domain where data varies substantially from the pretraining corpus
elements.2211.03154_17f8132b81786e5610b889a3c5af4: The mismatch between the pretraining and adaptation data distributions makes PLMs struggle to be widely adopted in practice
elements.2211.03154_4a047819d32c906551df370e9c969: A direct approach to improve generalization performance in machine learning is to enlarge the labeled training data
elements.2211.03154_96a980d8e13087ab6c20da4e0713a: However, acquiring labels for every task is expensive and time-consuming
elements.2211.03154_a23f3fdcea1e0d43ba7a81d280a7d: To this end, enabling PLMs with domain adaptation (DA)
elements.2211.03154_4c481a7e915f0d8ade659ac1b8840: which reuses labeled data from related source domains to boost performance on the target domain is necessary
elements.2211.03154_e59ed4a851077b16becf21c0503b3: Due to the semantic gap between the embedding spaces of different domains
elements.2211.03154_925f1bdba0de52436e00b09a6a402: , directly fitting a single PLM on non-identical domains is suboptimal
elements.2211.03154_8e449f9874b1221b4afc429b697c8: and may even incur negative transfer due to the domain shifts
elements.2211.03154_47e82723a6919116de11e4e64b7cb: Moreover, performance gains on the target domain can come at the expense of general-domain performance, which is recognized as the catastrophic forgetting problem
elements.2211.03154_f93933aa5eb86184eaa6d46bf00a9: The effectiveness of domain adaptation largely depends on how well the target domains are represented in the pretraining corpora
elements.2211.03154_a0b157ee70d7c32365bb8ffed3b82: To conduct successful knowledge transfer, a range of domain adaptation methods have been proposed based on different assumptions of the given data and the training setting
elements.2211.03154_3328ca1f1f9d79abb9b2df6385684: However, traditional domain adaptation methods that work with shallow neural networks or non-pretrained language models can be unfavorable to PLMs
elements.2211.03154_adb6dc8a9c3c7c34e36d116e30f68: find that domain adversarial training on top of BERT is unstable and has little effect on cross-domain performance, suggesting that proper design of domain adaptation methods is necessary for PLMs
elements.2211.03154_cee7ce8ee1f767fb854ca5e73571b: In addition, the long-standing challenge of data scarcity hinders the deployment of many domain-specific systems
elements.2211.03154_8f57be20d2854214862a02473a2c7: Developing domain adaptation and generalization methods for PLMs is promising particularly for data-hungry NLP tasks such as abstractive summarization
elements.2211.03154_680d4f0e23f2d89805452bc710b68: These methods can be incorporated into the pipeline of downstream tasks as easy as playing with "Lego"
elements.2211.03154_af6a150d7a1205665bfe78a0a906b: However, there isn't one-fit-all PLM or on-the-fly domain adaptation methods off the shelf
elements.2211.03154_2083be03e22f4402a0b6dc4478a91: Through comprehensive review of related literature, we argue that an appropriate choice of domain adaptation methods or a mixture of them can help to avoid performance degradation of PLMs in new domains
elements.2211.03154_418fd225ab78f076fc483d9316e2a: For this purpose, this survey aims to provide future researchers and engineers with a road map for accelerating the deployment of PLMs to real-world problems
elements.2211.03154_8af3d94df29e28de12feb946f3bc0: In the end, we highlight some interesting yet rather meaningful research directions to empower and apply PLMs.
elements.2211.03154_98eade340c3ad9fefb638e836bbf5: ) from a machine learning system view, covering data augmentation, model optimization and personalization techniques
elements.2211.03154_87af2fd2a6059e0297248209a9e78: The mainstream approaches focus on data augmentation and model optimization or a combination of them
elements.2211.03154_f25bd9f2086349eb3043b3e1141ce: Personalization has been less explored and most of the methods we surveyed are either recently emerging methods or a resurgence of traditional machine learning approaches
elements.2211.03154_9e96b90b6d9d57b21113072f98338: We deem this category is promising for practical adoption of PLMs at scale.
elements.2211.03154_895b320382b453e715b6985d529f6: Comprehensive surveys for domain adaptation or pretrained language models exist, each revisits related works from a different perspective: transfer learning surveys
elements.2211.03154_6b4fbebe71b4707d48f79c40cc021: provide a holistic view including but not limited to DA; DA for visual applications
elements.2211.03154_d4af1c0c922e4deaffc3b1717d49f: ; neural UDA for NLP applications based on shallow and non-pretrained language models
elements.2211.03154_1dce9a3ca58954134f1ff20c208f1: ; DA and MDA for machine translation
elements.2211.03154_10fa09b173968d933bbdf6f0dd4be: and comprehensive guide to use PLMs for NLP tasks
elements.2211.03154_bcc7fa1c227f20533f2eb10d2d846: and particularly for text generation tasks
elements.2211.03154_d7ff346ceb2a4c822f971cca52936: Adapting PLMs to specific domains is practically important as PLMs only hold general knowledge
elements.2211.03154_01204851f43f4c7a5dff7a8808bae: We aim to provide future researchers and engineers with a handbook picturing a systematic view of possible techniques to adapt PLMs to real-world applications more easily
elements.2211.03154_5e8da766e1a511b6d5fe49073d7fd: Previous surveys on PLMs focus on the pretraining techniques, surveys on domain adaptation focus on shallow and plain neural networks, and surveys on transfer learning focus on more broad assumptions or settings
elements.2211.03154_33df85c2047f590f3974f4590a537: In this paper, we systematically examine all the possible solutions for exploiting PLMs to new domains
elements.2211.03154_f3221494e3527281ec697ae6771dc: In addition, we propose a new category named personalization which focus on the setting where the same PLMs are expected to adapt to multiple target domains
elements.2211.03154_d96e8cfaf2b9cadd222ddad11de90: We explicitly visualize the assumptions, techniques and PLMs adopted in the literature in Table
elements.2211.03154_a7127c008729c23f33c92d66131db: to provide a big picture of the current state of research
elements.2211.03154_0484f058a2d7c63f2aad343ca5147: Finally, we outline challenges and future research directions.

elements.2211.03154_6f3106cac471e14fa3291c6d4bb79: to denote their corresponding token embeddings.
elements.2211.03154_ca083b21ec49504dba2752616000c: denotes the task-specific label for the sequence.

elements.2211.03154_19a048a70e63eb0ea13f4347d3cba: Source and target domains are differentiated by the subscriptions
elements.2211.03154_7959abbabfd0cb9c21ea3c9210638: to denote a probability distribution and

elements.2211.03154_c54d5f9fde518e23ff37dda2c905d: to denote a PLM parameterized by
elements.2211.03154_00c3494107e99e7181c3d5ab7cfda: analysis for domain adaptation demonstrate that the test error of supervised machine learning methods generally increases in proportion to the distribution differences between the training and test sets.
elements.2211.03154_fd85beaef19974657773b198d4669: A theoretical analysis for domain adaptation of language models indicates that pretraining on a larger out-of-domain dataset before fine-tuning on a small in-domain dataset can achieve better generalization than only in-domain training
elements.2211.03154_48f90473333e86d578ee609948351: They also show that larger size of pretraining sets does not necessarily bring performance gains to target domains
elements.2211.03154_de2fe4604cf71bba73bbd44e611fd: When their underlying distributions are similar, pretraining can benefit the target-domain tasks.
elements.2211.03154_e929a8f8238f128544ef7bc218772: The rapid development of transfer learning has given birth to a number of transfer learning settings with each holding a different assumption on the given data
elements.2211.03154_45c6b83666e10c9ca05118fad48f2: We review two adaptation settings for PLMs, namely adaptation from pretraining to downstream tasks, which is usually achieved by continual learning (Section
elements.2211.03154_a17cd2ab2ef1887b6700131fdf64a: ), and adaptation from related source domains to target domains of our interest
elements.2211.03154_4abb29569adb11c69b74c8414e3ee: Regarding the feature space and the amount of labels available, recent literature commonly adopt the following assumptions:
elements.2211.03154_334648e1c9015ec1db075c65e2248: Both domains share the whole feature space
elements.2211.03154_cbfb9864ad56102c210de478cb592: Only the source domain has labels;
elements.2211.03154_136abf017029da3460c60afe50bb9: The source and target domains share a part of the feature space
elements.2211.03154_33c67f2a9e1586c1f293ad7afe1f0: and make a difference between supervised domain adaptation (SDA) and unsupervised domain adaptation (UDA) depending on whether the target domain has labels
elements.2211.03154_fe5ed0e16d3c374453a5124100d10: Note that in existing literature, UDA often assumes a large amount of unlabeled data which is dense while SDA often assumes a small amount of labeled data which is sparse
elements.2211.03154_801c0723dc3dabe549fc357e97b82: Therefore, SDA does not always present an easier setting than UDA
elements.2211.03154_a60ca383a69d53dbf29ef13456603: A few research papers adopts a semi-supervised domain adaptation setting where a small amount of target-domain data are labeled, which is classified into SDA in our paper.

elements.2211.03154_cf3a6c1a9832fb381ff2db9ad5cff: The section of data augmentation includes all the techniques that augment the input data by selecting important samples, adding more useful data samples or adding extra information to adapt the model towards the target domains.

elements.2211.03154_94d3db51d0c74ac7c7ef110afd8cf: They have been applied to enhance machine translation performance
elements.2211.03154_11d7cab14b6b963edf9612a1eaf42: relax the hard selection procedure by assigning the normalized scores to source-domain samples and retain all the source-domain vocabulary while lowering the importance of irrelevant data during training
elements.2211.03154_9c7f68052224dfc2f9d9fbdf808ca: traces a model's prediction through backpropagated gradients over its training data to identify those training points that are important for making the prediction
elements.2211.03154_f7fc1f5fc481a39c1630a13d2b433: It has been applied to the pretrained ResNet for image processing tasks
elements.2211.03154_f872327efbf2e003aff4d30f6ab87: , vanilla Transformers for neural machine tranlation
elements.2211.03154_705b1ca901f9440e7122722ba3732: Other approaches may include training a domain classifier to select source-domain data based on the domain probability
elements.2211.03154_13f006da0ca3335f5f14a4c2b13ac: The lower the probability, the more similar the sample is to the target domain
elements.2211.03154_1e03bcad4c8af02421a44d54cb02a: They successfully enhanced domain adaptation of BERT on classification tasks
elements.2211.03154_4797e2902c9a4c054bde837a43ca6: Importance weighting techniques have also been studied for partial domain adaptation (PDA) where the target-domain classes are only a subset of source-domain classes
elements.2211.03154_1ff452b3693644c53cd25292b6cf9: propose a two domain classifier strategy to identify the importance score of source samples.
elements.2211.03154_fa256714f9fa947232b4c97a11e0e: propose a progressive weighting scheme to quantify the transferability of source examples to achieve PDA
elements.2211.03154_28ff7c1b51682ff429a6a3a6c0d0b: However, PDA has not been studied for PLMs adaptation yet.
elements.2211.03154_fbc568a32c9f4b0a4a9006ff81bc5: Pseudo labeling is a straightforward name for methods that use a source-domain classifier to generate pseudo labels for unlabeled data from the target domain
elements.2211.03154_c6969888d758526155eba81fa805f: Compared with importance sampling, pseudo labeling focuses on utilizing target-domain unlabeled data
elements.2211.03154_12799f0aba3f6e3e8eafcaa8e8458: It is also known as self-training
elements.2211.03154_4f1a53e737c3f36daf588854196dc: which utilizes the most confident labeled data from target domain to augment the source-domain labeled dataset to continuously train the source-domain model
elements.2211.03154_2125073a9c89ca8b88085c3b51fbb: The resulted model gains an improved discriminative ability on target-domain features
elements.2211.03154_e863974409580bf64af5bb89a5c8a: Pseudo labeling can be used in both SDA and UDA settings
elements.2211.03154_df875d37ff93d3b5a2ba2fc33a4a5: Since the capacity of PLMs is large enough, simply finetuning PLMs can easily overfit the corrupted labels and therefore hurt the generalization performance.
elements.2211.03154_711c59c0c474db59e11ce210ab479: propose to combine domain-adversarial learning with pseudo labeling where a trainable confusion matrix is optimized against a domain discriminator to reduce the gap between the pseudo-labels and the ground truth.
elements.2211.03154_8a74a5c99da17bda9b046faec91a0: to enhance BERT in Arabic cross-domain sentiment analysis.
elements.2211.03154_14dcc668c9f222ea9bdd536589402: enhances the quality of pseudo labels by combining self training with knowledge distillation, which distills feature discriminative ability from PLMs to a smaller feature extractor.
elements.2211.03154_44dd412bf6d89af1e6ea5d81b9b9b: propose to reduce the domain shift through cycle self-training where a target classifier is trained on the pseudo labeled target-domain dataset and is required to perform well on the labeled source-domain dataset
elements.2211.03154_4dacd5902ef721826c10be06fec0e: Self-training can be extended to gradual domain adaptation in which intermediate domains are treated as target domains step by step
elements.2211.03154_7debca9c659c1dfe32cf41f6ef421: Apart from self-training, pseudo labeling can be used to induce domain invariance for domain adaptation.
elements.2211.03154_c2c75b0f8ca6282ae07eaa19a5bbd: uses a LSTM-based model to generate pseudo questions for target-domain passages and train a domain classifier to discriminate a given passage-question pair as coming from which domain
elements.2211.03154_bb9b13e766ca10075f8111056e0b6: The answer generator is trained on the induced domain-invariant representations to adapt to the target domain task
elements.2211.03154_7f9dce68a64b09bf172eaf2e42345: Pseudo labeling methods can be applied to solve other machine learning problems such as learning from label proportions
elements.2211.03154_24c8fba6583f7bcc0017554423e49: Recently, prompt methods arise as a new paradigm for adapting PLMs to downstream tasks
elements.2211.03154_5260b5ce68197dc7175a82e102ddf: Prompting refers to methods that prompt the PLMs with additional information about the data such as task descriptions that are used to augment the input data
elements.2211.03154_083522509b1c533e3cf89577a1078: The resulted input data is usually in a cloze-question format where a template with prompt
elements.2211.03154_0dc919fb91ae9ab81000ce1535d2d: and a mask token is left for PLMs to predict the label words
elements.2211.03154_e2b36fffab4f616bea22bc394fcd7: With a properly designed prompt for the task at hand, a PLM can correctly generate the label words based on its inner language modeling knowledge priors, which has demonstrated excellent few-shot performance on a range of datasets
elements.2211.03154_4310c4bfe44cc566d1a7557404cb6: The effect of prompt may be derived from the fact that it leverages the language modeling objective to activate some parameters inside the PLM, making the relationship between the original input data and the label stronger
elements.2211.03154_8f86f9ce9f8aae0a9c72442be2e20: Recent studies show that the PLMs can behave differently with different kinds of prompts input to GPT

elements.2211.03154_ed917cc0b92acdb42641a305e69e7: A range of parameter-efficient adaptation methods has shown to be an alternative to finetuning for PLMs
elements.2211.03154_b0d6403713ae0e558a7b1e4efa408: With a few parameters tuned, the performance on downstream tasks can be comparable with finetuning

elements.2211.03154_00d2c2a88eb21fea8d910f4c874c9: PLMs have demonstrated to be knowledgeable AI artifacts and they have shown enough capacity to keep lifelong learning
elements.2211.03154_f18021fd7fe798857adcf8659ea32: , which can be treated as an extreme example of domain adaptation
elements.2211.03154_ab76e8f853d9cc040074b817cef8e: In real-world scenarios, PLMs are expected to interact with human and keep updated to new domains without forgetting the general knowledge
elements.2211.03154_0b9884537cd5927e051c4ed7bfa55: Continual finetuing of PLMs from one domain to another in a sequential manner can be easily trapped in the catastrophic forgetting problem
elements.2211.03154_877af4295ca1a766fbb543020a8d6: is an approach to mitigate the problem for lifelong learning
elements.2211.03154_c1abf8f183d498fa4ad8fe7f313e8: It works by only allowing model parameters that are less important to general-domain performance to be adapted to the target domain
elements.2211.03154_0684a16f1fa2e3811822dd6046ba3: The idea is coincidentally similar to the recently rising research on parameter-efficient adaptation of PLMs, e.g., prompt tuning
elements.2211.03154_d05550c3e7dd6a64e5532798bc8da: On top of frozen PLMs, prompt tuning shows competitive generalization performance as full-model finetuning
elements.2211.03154_078722435bffead096f16548a30d8: With most of the prelearned parameters untouched, PLMs requires only a few parameters to be trained
elements.2211.03154_ca4471b423d690ac7be67113da135: The use of some properly designed domain adaptation methods can further boost parameter-efficient learning with a few examples
elements.2211.03154_a0a3174afa345a22f2118e66e193c: , which is promising to circumvent the episodic memory requirement in lifelong learning
elements.2211.03154_2692a87338badf45bd3c519adec47: The diversity among different users can hinder the acceleration of scaled product service provided by PLMs
elements.2211.03154_a1953a49f3612883304619ce0727a: Personalization is critically important to empower interactive systems such as virtual assistants where a single model is expected to be adapted to many users based on the understanding the user's intents
elements.2211.03154_bc5f0c9933f341a565af3915a8116: Domain adaptation techniques are promising to achieve this purpose
elements.2211.03154_878d9fed81fca3004e2db2e23887b: Domain adaptation for personalization has been well studied in CV
elements.2211.03154_fdd00886ee3702c10665a6a66c52e: In NLP, personalization has been mainly studied in customized machine translation
elements.2211.03154_2842475eac5c5240cd54a0bbb9685: Applying personalization methods such as posterior adaptation allows incremental adaptation of PLMs in which a user can provide a correct translation of each segment just after receiving machine translation suggestions and the system is able to train on that correction before generating next suggestions
